search.query: index="fred_data" SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where Category="Interest Rates" | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval seriesid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $$seriesid]) | fields * | search SeriesID IN (DGS1MO,DGS3MO,DGS6MO,DGS1,DGS2,DGS3,DGS5,DGS7,DGS10,DGS20,DGS30) | eval Maturity=case(SeriesID == "DGS1MO", 1, SeriesID == "DGS3MO", 3, SeriesID == "DGS6MO", 6, SeriesID == "DGS1", 12, SeriesID == "DGS2", 24, SeriesID == "DGS3", 36, SeriesID == "DGS5", 60, SeriesID == "DGS7", 84, SeriesID == "DGS10", 120, SeriesID == "DGS20", 240, SeriesID == "DGS30", 360) | rename Value as Yield | sort Date desc| chart first(Yield) as Yield by Maturity
index="fred_data" DFF | chart first(Value) as Latest_Reading by _time
index="fred_data" MORTGAGE30US | chart first(Value) as Latest_Reading by _time
index="fred_data" DEXUSEU | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXUSUK | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXCHUS | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXJPUS | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXCAUS | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXUSAL | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DEXMXUS | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where Category="Bond Market Indexes" | table FredID, Name | sort FredID
index="fred_data" SeriesID IN ($FRED_SERIES_TOK2$) | chart avg(Value) as value by _time SeriesID
index="fred_data" SeriesID IN (M1,M2) | chart values(Value) as value by _time, SeriesID
index="fred_data" RPONTTLD | stats avg(Value) as Average
index="fred_data" RRPONTTLD | stats avg(Value) as Average

panel.title: Crude Oil Prices: WTI Crude US

index="fred_data" SLVPRUSD | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum

index="fred_data" DDFUELNYH | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum
index="fred_data" DJFUELUSGULF | sort _time desc | stats max(Value) as Maximum, min(Value) as Minimum, first(Value) as Last_Value | gauge Last_Value,Minimum,Maximum

index="fred_data" SP500 | chart avg(Value) as value by _time
